basics.name: Leilani Reich
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science (Data Science track) in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2023.

education.area: Computer Science - Data Science track (expected Spring, 2023)
courses: ICS 211: Intro to Computer Science II
ICS 111: Intro to Computer Science I

work.summary: Working on healthcare data projects as an intern in the HDI data analytics department.
Acting as assistant for TA in ICS 211, Intro to Computer Science II (Java).
highlights: Advising students in lab and open office hours weekly.

work.summary: Acted as assistant for TA in ICS 211, Intro to Computer Science II (Java).
highlights: Advised students in lab and open office hours weekly.

volunteer.summary: I help tutor 6th-12th grade students in web development with HTML, CSS, and JS.
I take part in volunteer activities including food drives and beach cleanups.

awards.title: UHM Summer Success Scholarship
awards.awarder: University of Hawai'i at Mānoa College of Natural Sciences
awards.summary: Students must be a declared CNS major and have UH Manoa as their home institution for summer 2022 to be eligible.

awards.title: UH Manoa Summer First-Year Merit Scholarship
awards.awarder: University of Hawai'i at Mānoa Outreach College
awards.summary: Scholarship awarded to first-years at UH Manoa who have registered for at least three summer credits, have at least 27 credits, and have a minimum overall GPA of 3.5.

awards.title: Manoa Excellence Scholarship
awards.awarder: University of Hawai'i at Mānoa New Warrior Scholarship Committee
awards.summary: Scholarship awarded to a select few incoming non-resident freshmen who have completed high school with a minimum overall GPA of 3.8.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.awarder: UH Manoa Office of the Registrar
awards.summary: Award given to undergraduate students who earn a semester GPA of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more and do not receive grades of NC (no credit), W (withdrawn), I(incomplete), or F (failure).
